name: Maria's Cinco de Mayo Enchilada Party Ring
author: sk
summary: A delicious party ring, perfect for entertaining!
ingredients: 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, or more to taste
1 cup crushed corn chips (such as Frito's®), divided
1 (16 ounce) package corn chips (such as Fritos®), or to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Place chicken in a mixing bowl
Place chopped tomatoes in a bowl and add lime juice; stir to combine and add to chicken mixture
Reserve 2 tablespoons crushed chips and add remaining chips to chicken mixture
Sprinkle reserved crushed chips onto a cutting board
Unroll crescent roll dough and press into chips
Separate dough into triangles and arrange in a ring with points facing out on a baking sheet, leaving a 5-inch diameter open circle in the center
Scoop chicken mixture onto the wide end of each triangle
Fold edges of dough over to create a ring
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 20 to 25 minutes
Garnish with salsa, sour cream, and avocado
